comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Photography Paradiso, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 87384427@N00
comment._content: How could this have been taken in 1910, given that there were no Olympic games that year?

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Ray Radlein: 1912 it is!  We'll update the year inside the description of the photo. For the Flickr "taken some time in" year, we used "1910" as a placeholder to indicate the decade. We're still figuring out how to provide more specific chronological information as we load photos in batches.

comment.author: 82214664@N00
comment._content: Not a whole lot of "lookers" on the '12 team. That is  as homely a group of guys this side of major league baseball. :-)

comment.author: 11190727@N04
comment._content: Looking at the right side of this photo it seems to be missing a part or maybe there is a second photo to get the rest of the team in the long wide panoramic style?

comment.author: 25249480@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Athletes, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2890283866/ for the team to the left. The "TI" on the billboard is the end of "TUTTI FRUTTI".

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to Encyclopedia of Ethnicity and Sports in the United States by George B. Kirsch, Othello Harris, Claire Elaine Nolte (2000) [http://books.google.com/books?id=xdV_JV1fbZMC&pg=PA237&lpg=PA237], IAAC is the Irish-American Athletic Club in New York City. However, since several IAAC members were in the 1912 olympic team, this doesn't help identify the individual wearing the shirt with that logo.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ted_Meredith has a picture that could be the guy with the M on his shirt. Apparently, "James Edwin "Ted" Meredith (November 14, 1891 – November 2, 1957) was an American athlete, winner of two gold medals at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ... Ted Meredith made the 1912 Olympic team while still in high school at Mercersburg Academy."
